info.title: Sec-Gemini
info.description: Sec-Gemini is an experimental AI model focused on advancing cybersecurity AI frontiers.

post.description:
Update `Session` based of the input `PublicSession`.

Security note: this function updates only very specific and
security-irrelevant fields.

schema.title: Response List Sessions V1 Session List Get
Response Get V1 Session Get Get

get.description: Generate a name for the session using Gemini

post.description: Upload a file to cloud bucket and attach it to the session
Detach a file from the session.

get.description: Provide an overview of sec-gemini agent current configuration

Return prompts used by the agents
Returns:
    JSONResponse: nx.from_dict_of_dicts

Return SecGemini graph as dict of dicts
Returns:
    JSONResponse: nx.from_dict_of_dicts
Returns the diagnostics information for the application.
Performs health checks and returns the status of the application and its dependencies.

session_id.title: Session ID
session_id.description: The session ID this file should be attached to.

mime_type.title: Mime Type
mime_type.description: The mime type of the file. This is used as a hint, and it may be overridden.

content.title: File Content
content.description: The content of the file as string. Always base64 encoded.

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: Represents a file upload to the session.

session_id.title: Session ID
session_id.description: The session ID this file should be deleted from.

DetachFileRequest.title: DetachFileRequest
DetachFileRequest.description: Represents a file upload to the session.

session_id.title: Session ID
session_id.description: The session ID this feedback should be attached to.

group_id.title: Group ID
group_id.description: The message group ID this feedback should be attached to.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.description: Represents a feedback to the session.

FeedbackType.title: FeedbackType
FeedbackType.description: Type of feedback that can be sent to the system.

id.title: Message ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the message - uuid4 int.

parent_id.title: Parent Message ID
parent_id.description: The ID of the parent message.

turn.title: Conversation Turn
turn.description: The turn identifier is used to group/message are part of the same conversation turn.

group.title: Message Group
group.description: The Group ID (UUID4) identify messages part of the same generation or action.

actor.title: Actor
actor.description: The actor of the message - user or agent.

role.description: The role of the messages author.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: DEPRECATED: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of when the message was created.

created_at.title: Creation timestamp
created_at.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds, including fractional parts) indicating when the message was created.

message_type.title: Message Type
message_type.description: The type of message - Generation, Tool Call, or Info.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Custom svg icon to use in the UI.

text_color.title: Text Color
text_color.description: Custom text color to use in the UI.

state.description: The state the message belongs to.

content.title: Message Content
content.description: The content of the message encoded as utf-8 bytes.

mime_type.title: Content Type
mime_type.description: The content type of the content field.

status_code.title: Status Code
status_code.description: The status code of the message. 2xx is Okay, 4xx is a client error, 5xx is a server error.

usage.title: Model Usage Statistics
usage.description: Token counts when message was generated by model.
